sent.orig: Pursue only what you can and should acquire. Never pursue what you can't and shouldn't acquire.
sent.trans: 能要、该要的才要；不能要，不该要的绝对不要。

sent.orig: Or again do battle to acquire virtues, and then remain watchful in order to guard them.
sent.trans: 另一方面，我们应该要努力奋斗、养成美德、保持警醒，随时守护自心的善行。

sent.orig: Be positive and creative with proven ability to acquire potential customers.
sent.trans: 积极创新，并具有发现潜在客户需求的才能。

sent.orig: For logistics,we have to acquire,store,and distribute material.
sent.trans: 在后勤方面，我们必须获取、存储以及分发物资。

sent.orig: We can not only acquire good dynamic response, but also make noise and disturbance minimum.
sent.trans: 设计出的自适应逆控制系统，不仅可以得到好的动态响应，还可以使噪声和扰动减小到最小。
